name: Dream City (zxrysky)
description:
DREAM CITY is a short adventure RPG by YUAN made in WOLF RPG Editor. 

A nameless stranger wakes up in a strange town...

The people are nice and friendly...

But something dark lurks.

This game is about 3 hours long. There is only one ending, but some divergence in dialogue based on choice. 

There are SPOILERS for Omniscient Reader in this game. 

If there are any bugs, you can drop me a comment here, but there should be no game-breaking bugs.

How long will you be trapped in this dream...?

=======================

If you would like to support me, you can drop me a kofi!

If you would like to support the artist, muni, for the fantastic character and enemy art, you can drop muni a kofi!

(Note: there are some parts of text that may overlap with the character art, but it only overlaps a little bit and the words are still understandable.)

A walkthrough can be found here.
